problem.display_name: Graded question - Mapping Reference Numerators - Question 2
problem.markdown:
By ticking the "core" check box when assigning a data element to a numerator you are doing what?
>>Select the correct answer (1 attempt) <<
(x) A. Placing that data element into the "core" data group that can be selected for analysis. ( ) B. Marking the data element for follow-up by a system administrator
[explanation] Placing that data element into the "core" data group that can be selected for analysis is correct. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: By ticking the "core" check box when assigning a data element to a numerator you are doing what?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the correct answer (1 attempt)

choicegroup.choice: A. Placing that data element into the "core" data group that can be selected for analysis.
B. Marking the data element for follow-up by a system administrator

div.p: Placing that data element into the "core" data group that can be selected for analysis is correct.
